select task.id, task.year, projectType.typeOne , projectType.typeTwo , task.seq, task.content, task.finishDateLimit,
( select isnull(max(proceePercent),0) from jc_taskReport where reportDate= ( select max(reportDate) reportDate from jc_taskReport jc where jc.taskId=task.id and jc.dutyUntil = '${dutyUntil}' ) and taskId=task.id and dutyUntil = '${dutyUntil}' ) as proceePercent, task.state, ( select isnull(count(tr.id),0) from jc_taskReport as tr where tr.nearReportDate <= #{sysDate} and tr.planReportDate >= #{sysDate} and tr.state=0 and tr.taskId=task.id
and tr.dutyUntil = '${dutyUntil}'
) as yellowColor,
( select isnull(count(tr.id),0) from jc_taskReport as tr where tr.planReportDate <= #{sysDate} and tr.state=0 and tr.taskId=task.id
and tr.dutyUntil = '${dutyUntil}'
) as redColor
from jc_task as task, jc_projectType as projectType
task.projectTypeId=projectType.id
and charindex('${dutyUntil}',task.dutyUnits)>0
and task.year = ${year}
and task.state = ${state}
and projectType.id = '${projectTypeId}'
and task.content like '${content}%'
order by task.state, projectType.typeOne,cast(projectType.seq as int),task.seqnumber

select task.id, task.year, projectType.typeOne , projectType.typeTwo , task.seq, task.content, task.finishDateLimit,
(select avg(proceePercent) from ( select rt.dutyUntil, (select isnull(max(proceePercent),0) from jc_taskReport where taskId=task.id and dutyUntil=rt.dutyUntil ) as proceePercent from jc_taskReport as rt where rt.taskId=task.id group by dutyUntil ) as tmpTable) as proceePercent, task.state, ( select isnull(count(tr.id),0) from jc_taskReport as tr where tr.nearReportDate <= #{sysDate} and tr.planReportDate >= #{sysDate} and tr.state=0 and tr.taskId=task.id ) as yellowColor,
( select isnull(count(tr.id),0) from jc_taskReport as tr where tr.planReportDate <= #{sysDate} and tr.state=0 and tr.taskId=task.id ) as redColor, ( select count(*) from jc_taskReport as tr where tr.state=1 and tr.taskId=task.id and tr.modifyState = 1 ) as modifyState
from jc_task as task, jc_projectType as projectType
task.projectTypeId=projectType.id
and task.year = ${year}
and task.state = ${state}
and projectType.id = '${projectTypeId}'
and task.content like '${content}%'
and charindex('${dutyUntil}',task.dutyUnits)>0
and charindex('${dutyLeader}',task.dutyLeaders)>0
order by task.state, projectType.typeOne,cast(projectType.seq as int),task.seqnumber
